description: Variation of conditions 1 and 4 of planning permission dated 28th March 2019 (RN 18/08748/FULL) for the Excavation of a basement under existing house, enlarged lower ground floor under part of front and rear gardens with enlarged front lightwell and formation of rear lightwell, extension of ground floor living space, erection of concrete garden wall to rear garden and heightening level of rear garden, erection of roof extension between existing front and rear ridges at main roof level and associated fenestration changes. NAMELY, changes to windows and doors.
